q: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Stay hungry, stay foolish.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
The universe is under no obligation to make sense to you.
Look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
Beauty is truth, truth beauty.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
I believe in the sun and the stars.
The universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself.
Look deep into nature, and then you will understand everything better.
Astronomy compels the soul to look upwards.
I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
One touch of nature makes the whole world kin.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
The earth laughs in flowers.
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
I think, therefore I am.
The heart has its reasons of which reason knows nothing.
Two things awe me most: the starry sky above and the moral law within.
Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not.
The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Spread love everywhere you go.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine.
Youth is happy because it has the capacity to see beauty.
Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
It is not that we have a little time, but that we lose a lot.
It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
A room without books is like a body without a soul.
To love another person is to see the face of God.
The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
Beauty will save the world.
Reality exists in the human mind, and nowhere else.
Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you.
Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.
We are what we pretend to be.
There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Forever is composed of nows.
All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.
The sun never says to the earth, 'You owe me.'
Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain...
Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.
I can calculate the motion of heavenly bodies, but not the madness of people.
The first principle is that you must not fool yourself.
If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy.
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
Whether you think you can, or you think you can't – you're right.
It is possible to fly without motors, but not without knowledge and skill.
That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.
I see Earth! It is so beautiful.
Be thankful for problems. If they were less difficult, someone with less ability might have your job.
Decide in your heart of hearts what really excites and challenges you.
Never be limited by other people's limited imaginations.
What you do makes a difference.
It seems to me that the natural world is the greatest source of excitement.
Those who contemplate the beauty of the earth find reserves of strength.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen.
When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
Out of your vulnerabilities will come your strength.
What a man can be, he must be.
The curious paradox is that when I accept myself just as I am, then I can change.
This is the real secret of life -- to be completely engaged with what you are doing.
We're all just walking each other home.
There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way.
It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
Change is the only constant in life.
Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
The love that moves the sun and the other stars.
The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.
I have striven not to laugh at human actions... but to understand them.
I much prefer the sharpest criticism of a single intelligent man to the thoughtless approval of the masses.
